item.title: DevOps Fundamentals Bread Maker Analogy
item.description:
DevOps 3 Fundamentals: The Bread Maker Analogy üçû‚öôÔ∏è

DevOps is like a bread maker ‚Äî it takes a variety of inputs, processes them, and produces a final product with minimal manual intervention. Just like how you add ingredients to a bread maker (flour, yeast, sugar, etc.), DevOps involves feeding in code, infrastructure, and automation to produce a continuous flow of delivery. Let‚Äôs break down the 3 fundamentals of DevOps and explore some best practices using the bread maker analogy!
